pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AOMaker*AOMaker* means "api object maker",yes,It can help you play your API like building blocks !## Design Philosophy- Based on the design idea of api object- Anything is modularized and abstracted- Return to the coding,balance generality and flexibility## Key Features- integrate *requests,pytest,allure*- layered structure:base api--api definition--api object--case--testcase--testdata- Import custom fixture automatically- generate api object automatically by *swagger*- generate testcase automatically by *api object*- Switch test environment with one click- CLI command supported
